GET /api.description: serves up a json representation of all the available endpoints of the api

GET /api/topics.description: serves an array of all topics

GET /api/articles.description: serves an array of all articles ordered by date in descending order which can be filter by topic if passed a topic query

GET /api/articles/:article_id.description: serves the object of an article matching article_id

GET /api/articles/:article_id/comments.description: serves an array of all comments associated with a particular article_id, sorted by date in ascending order

POST /api/articles/:article_id/comments.description: adds a comment to the database and returns the added comment; request body accepts an object with username and body properties

PATCH /api/articles/:article_id.description: updates the relevant article's votes property and returns the article when passed; request body accepts an object in the form { inc_votes: newVote } where new vote is a number
